data.message: #ichoosesaturday me and my best friend Rhiannon Collier would love to come to the jingle bell ball it's something we've always looked forward too and we'd love to see Louisa Johnson and all the other amazing artists! It would be the perfect Christmas Present and the best Christmas ever🎄❄️☃️🎅🏼🎉

replies.message: We also have to see the absolute love of my life Shawn bloody Mendes like can we just 😍😍😍
Abbey Jones Louisa Johnson has a message for you! Thanks for entering #CapitalJBB #HolidaysAreComing https://www.facebook.com/1545297492377124/videos/1787920711448133
Abbey Jones I won't be buying tickets as i'm going Leeds fest Hun x
Rhiannon Collier Yeah I know and ey am coming with you x
Abbey Jones well if you're coming my mums getting me the tickets in Feb so if you give me the money for then then I'll get both of ours xxx
Okie dokie and you did invite me over text and tbh I probably wouldn't be able to afford these tickets atm rather just win em xxx
Abbey Jones yes abbey obviously I remember but I thought you were buying your own ticket for Leeds and same TBH xxxx
